title: Artificial Intelligence

definitions.Artificial Intelligence: The simulation of human intelligence processes by computer systems
definitions.Learning to Act: The ability of a system to take actions based on its learning

formulas: The formula for calculating the accuracy of a model is: Accuracy = (True Positives + True Negatives) / (True Positives + True Negatives + False Positives + False Negatives)
summary: The slide presents the concept of Artificial Intelligence, focusing on the 'Learning to Act' aspect. It includes a definition of Artificial Intelligence and a formula for calculating model accuracy. The keywords are Artificial Intelligence, Learning to Act, Simulation, Computer Systems, and Human Intelligence.
